sections.title: Details
content: It is a Street Play competiton.

sections.title: Structure
content: Open exclusively to current students of COEP.
Participants will draw a Bollywood scene and recreate it with a different ending.
Each team will receive a different scene
Teams will have Preparation Time (20 minutes) to plan and rehearse their reimagined scene with the new ending.
Perform the reimagined scene live on stage.
Each performance should be between 1.5 and 3 minutes long.

sections.title: Guidelines
content: - All performances must be free of vulgarity and cuss words.
Content should be appropriate for a college audience and uphold the values of COEP.
